Welcome to Our App!

System Vista is a restaurant management platform designed to streamline operations and enhance the dining experience. It allows restaurant owners to efficiently manage tables, create and edit menus, and generate QR codes for seamless digital ordering. Customers can scan QR codes to browse the menu, add items to their cart, and place orders effortlessly. The system also facilitates order delivery within the restaurant and ensures accurate billing based on item prices. With its user-friendly interface and automated features, System Vista simplifies restaurant management, improving efficiency and customer satisfaction.

Table Management

Step 1: Click on Add new table button

Click on the "Add New Table" button to create a new table. A form may appear where you can define table attributes, or a table will be generated instantly for data entry..

Step 2: Create new Table

Create new table and enter your Username ,password and seat capacity.

Menu Management

Step 1: Click on Add new Item

Click on the "Add New Item" button to insert a new entry into the table. Fill in the required fields, such as Username, Password, and Seat Capacity, then click Save to store the data.

Step 2: Create you Item

Here you can also create items into sections like Appetizers, Main Course, and Desserts.

Step 3: Click on Edit option

Edit option will help you to edit your dish name.

Step 4: Update your Item's Details

With the help of Update Item option we can update the details of our option.

Step 5: Click on Update Image

If you want to update the image of your dish then click on update image

Step 6: Update your Item's Image

Here you can upload the upadsted image of your Item.
